Morning: Good morning my sunshine ☀️, your smile lights up my day!
Rise and shine, love! You make mornings worth waking up for 💕
Afternoon: Thinking of you this afternoon ❤️, hope your day’s as sweet as your smile!
Hey love 😘, just checking in to remind you you’re amazing!
Evening: Evenings are beautiful, but they’d be perfect with you by my side 🌇
I can’t wait to hear your voice tonight, my heart’s peace 💖
Good Night: Good night my love 🌙, dream of us together!
Romantic: If kisses were stars, I’d send you a galaxy 🌌
You’re my today, my tomorrow, and every heartbeat in between ❤️
Funny: You must be made of copper and tellurium because you’re Cu-Te 😏
You stole my heart, but I’ll let it slide… for now 😜
